item.name: Chaotic Quiver of Tricks
entries: This quiver can hold up to 20 {@item arrow|phb|arrows} or {@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}.

As an action, you can touch this quiver and transform up to 4 pieces of nonmagical ammunition inside the quiver into a random piece of {@filter trick ammunition|items|source=j:ammo|type=ammunition} of the same base type. The ammunition remains magical until it hits a target or you use this action again. Once you use this action, you cannot use it again until the next dawn.

item.name: Chaotic Pouch of Tricks
entries: This pouch can hold up to 20 {@item sling bullet|phb|sling bullets}, {@item firearm bullet|J:Firearms|firearm bullets} or 50 {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}.

As an action, you can touch this pouch and transform up to 4 pieces of nonmagical ammunition inside the pouch into a random piece of {@filter trick ammunition|items|source=j:ammo|type=ammunition} of the same base type. The ammunition remains magical until it hits a target or you use this action again. Once you use this action, you cannot use it again until the next dawn.

item.name: Quiver of Tricks
entries: This quiver can hold up to 20 {@item arrow|phb|arrows} or {@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}.

As an action, you can touch this quiver and transform up to 4 pieces of nonmagical ammunition inside the quiver into your choice of {@filter trick ammunition|items|source=j:ammo|type=ammunition} of the same base type. The ammunition remains magical until it hits a target or you use this action again. Once you use this action, you cannot use it again until the next dawn.

item.name: Pouch of Tricks
entries: This pouch can hold up to 20 {@item sling bullet|phb|sling bullets}, {@item firearm bullet|J:Firearms|firearm bullets} or 50 {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}.

As an action, you can touch this pouch and transform up to 4 pieces of nonmagical ammunition inside the pouch into your choice of {@filter trick ammunition|items|source=j:ammo|type=ammunition} of the same base type. The ammunition remains magical until it hits a target or you use this action again. Once you use this action, you cannot use it again until the next dawn.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a target with this ammunition, the arrow transforms into a {@item net|phb}. The target is {@condition restrained} as described in the net's description.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, the target grows in size, as if targeted by the Enlarge effect of the {@spell enlarge/reduce|phb} spell. The target automatically fails the saving throw, unless it expends a Legendary Resistance.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, the target shrinks in size, as if targeted by the Reduce effect of the {@spell enlarge/reduce|phb} spell. The target automatically fails the saving throw, unless it expends a Legendary Resistance.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a target with this ammunition, the target is encased in a protective field, as if targeted by the {@spell shield of faith|phb} spell.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a target with this ammunition, the target is surrounded by a cloud of thick smoke, as if targeted by the {@spell fog cloud|phb} spell.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, the ammunition explodes and each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 3d6} fire damage. A creature takes half as much damage on a success. Objects in the area also take this damage.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, it splashes burning fluid over the target. The target takes {@dice 1d6} fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, thousands of {@item Ball Bearings (bag of 1,000)|phb|ball bearings} explode outwards, covering a level area 15 feet square, centered on the target. The balls vanish after one minute.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, it becomes magically tethered to a random creature within 15 feet of it. Until the tether is broken with a DC 10 Strength check, neither terget can move, or be moved more than 15 feet away from the other. A creature can drag another creature that it is tethered to but its movement speed is halved when doing so.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, the ammunition emits a sonic blast that is audible up to 300 feet away. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target must make a Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 2d8} thunder damage and become {@condition deafened} until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not {@condition deafened}. If this damage reduces a cretaure to 0 hit points, it becomes {@condition unconscious} and is stable.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, a spray of water erupts in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, extinguishing exposed, nonmagical fires within the area. Each creature within the area is hit by 5 gallons of water, which dissipates at the end of the turn.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a Large or smaller target with this ammunition, the target must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you. On a success, the target is only pushed 5 feet.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a Large or smaller target with this ammunition, the target must make a Strength saving throw or be pulled 15 feet towards you. On a success, the target is only pulled 5 feet.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, a random bird appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the target and is hostile to the target. The bird takes its turn immediately after the current one and must do everything it can to harm and harass the target. Roll a {@dice d6} to determine the type of bird; 1 for {@creature chicken|J:General}, 2 for {@creature eagle|mm}, 3 for {@creature peacock|bgdia}, 4 for {@creature raven|mm}, 5 for {@creature owl|mm} or 6 for {@creature giant owl|mm}. The bird vanishes after 1 hour, or if it dies.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you fire this ammunition, you can speak a short phrase or noise. On a hit, the ammunition reproduces this phrase or noise from the location of the target. You can choose to have the ammunition repeat the phrase or noise up to once per turn until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a Strength saving throw or be pulled 10 feet towards the target, starting with those closest to the target. If this movement would move a creature or object into the space of another creature or object, both creatures take {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage and the first creature stops moving.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit a target with this ammunition, each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away the target in a straight line, starting with those closest to the target. If this movement would move a creature or object into the space of another creature or object, both creatures take {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage and the first creature stops moving.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.
When you hit a creature with this ammunition, it must make a Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until it spends an action to vomit.

At the DM's discretion, a poisoned creature might choose to move to another location in order to vomit, such as to an outhouse, creek or over a ledge. A creature is unlikely to do this if it is aware of a more immediate threat, such as being in combat.

entries.name: Trick Ammunition
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. On a hit, the ammunition does not deal damage, instead triggering a magic effect as described below. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

If the effect allows a creature to make a saving throw, this saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + the ability modifier you used for the attack. If the effect is a spell that normally requires concentration, it does not require concentration and lasts for its full duration.

When you hit an object or creature within 60 feet using this ammunition, you teleport to unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of the target. If no unoccupied space is available you are shunted back to your original space and both you and the target take {@dice 1d8} force damage.
